actions.text: Amendment SA 619 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 619 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Chambliss. (consideration: CR S3673-3677; text: CR S 3673) To provide Edward Byrne Memorial Justice Assistance Grant Program funding as authorized in the Violence Against Women and Department of Justice Reauthorization act of 2005.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 619 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 619 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Chambliss.

purpose: To provide Edward Byrne Memorial Justice Assistance Grant Program funding as authorized in the Violence Against Women and Department of Justice Reauthorization act of 2005.
